title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2492/97 of 12 December 1997 suspending the sale of butter from public stocks pursuant to Articles 3a and 4a of Regulation (EEC) No 2315/76
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2492/97 of 12 December 1997 suspending the sale of butter from public stocks pursuant to Articles 3a and 4a of Regulation (EEC) No 2315/76
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Sales of butter from public stocks pursuant to Articles 3a and 4a of Regulation (EEC) No 2315/76 are hereby suspended.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 December 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
